author: nishant0
content:
So i was looking through the test vectors here and one of the new test cases uses a 
https://media.githubusercontent.com/media/ethereum/eth2.0-spec-tests/v1.0-rc-0/tests/general/phase0/bls/fast_aggregate_verify/small/fast_aggregate_verify_infinity_pubkey/data.yaml
`messages` field, when every other test case uses a `message` field. 

This has already been raised and fixed here:
https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/2099

But the generated test cases haven't been updated, I can work around it for now, but would be easier to have them fixed soon too.

author: djrtwo
content: I have a few more test vectors under review. I can cut an rc-1 with fixed vectors by tomorrow
